name: Cosmikazi
description:
Smash into asteroids to gain enough mass to plug a black hole while avoiding enemy ships and their attacks, once you're big enough you can start smashing bigger asteroids and bigger ships!

WASD - Move

Spacebar - Speed Boost

NOTE: Use ALT-F4 to quit the game.

We didn't have enough time to implement any story, but our writer DID write one:

“Story”

A ship flies up to an asteroid, carves a face into it with its laser, and flies away. The face stays still for a moment before blinking awake.

“What… happened?

My head… hurts.

I…

Where am I?

It’s… peaceful.”

Fade out, then fade back in. More debris surrounds the asteroid.

“I have been drifting for so long…

All alone...

But…

I feel it calling me…

Pulling me…

A void that pulls everything towards itself...

It devours… and grows larger…

And there’s nothing I can do…”

A new ship comes onscreen, flying erratically.

“Go away! Buzz off!

Can’t you see I’m busy, contemplating my own doom?”

The ship crash-lands onto the asteroid, its thrusters still sputtering.

“Ouch! What the…

Wh-WHOA!”

The ship’s thrusters fire at full blast for a few seconds, propelling him in whichever direction.

“Hey, I can move around like those Orionoids now!

I feel a bit heavier too…

If I can get bigger, just like that void, then maybe…

Just maybe…”
